page.title: 13Interview -Dr.Stennett(BCHE)
page.content: We interviewed Dr. Anne Stennett, the Vice-Principal of B.C.H.E. on the 9th of July 1985 . At the college the courses the students take last mainly 3 years but some students take courses that last 1 ,2 or 4 years. At the moment at Newton Park more buildings are being built for the Home Economics students (see "The Merger"). They hope to have the movement of students completed by September 1986. At Newton Park College the average age of a student is from 18 to 21 years. There are 1200 full time students and 150 part time artists. 250 live at Newton Park; the rest either share a house or flat in Bath or live with parents, if their home is close enough to college.
